subject: Re: Breakthru College - Staging to Prod Cutover

full_threads.body: (90mins)

Hi Joshua,

All good :)

Confirming the site is now live. https://breakthrucollege.edu.au/

Thanks for the speedy response Joel. The SMTP issue is going to take some more time - I'll need to work with our internal IT team as it's an error with our OAuth authentication and has something to do with our Azure server access tokens which is beyond my understanding/level of access.

For now, please take down our maintenance page so the website is accessible to the general public. Everything else looks great, and I'll resolve this issue in the background in the meantime.

Regards,

Joshua Cook

Marketing Manager, Disability Services

Thanks for confirming.

We have updated the page https://breakthrucollege.edu.au/qualifications/certificate-iii-individual-support/ and resave the page which fixes the minimal styling issues.

Hey mate,

Yes please, I want the URL to remain https://breakthrucollege.edu.au/qualifications/certificate-iii-individual-support/ but display the content from https://breakthrucollege.edu.au/chc33021-certificate-iii-in-individual-support-new/.

I noticed some of the styling on https://breakthrucollege.edu.au/chc33021-certificate-iii-in-individual-support-new/ is broken again (though not as badly as last time). Can you please look at this for me in the process?

I'll look into the SMTP issue now.

Hi Joshua,

All good! 😊
Just wanted to confirm—would you like us to take all the content from this page:
https://breakthrucollege.edu.au/chc33021-certificate-iii-in-individual-support-new/
and replace the content currently on this page:
https://breakthrucollege.edu.au/qualifications/certificate-iii-individual-support/

https://breakthrucollege.edu.au/wp-admin/admin.php?page=wp-mail-smtp

Thanks so much Joel! I'm just in a meeting but will check this shortly.

While I'm preoccupied, can I actually trouble you to please point the new page that we had at https://breakthrucollegenewstg.kinsta.cloud/chc33021-certificate-iii-in-individual-support-new/ to https://breakthrucollege.edu.au/qualifications/certificate-iii-individual-support/?

Hi Joshua,

I hope all is well.

Just confirming that the primary domain https://breakthrucollege.edu.au is now live and fully pointing to the new site previously located at breakthrucollegenewstg.kinsta.cloud .

You can now log in and run through the site for final checks:
🔗 Admin Login

Please let me know if you encounter any issues or need anything further.

Hi Joshua,

I hope all is well.

We are starting going to add maintenance mode for both website current live and staging. And will start to move the primary domain.

We will update you once its is done and ready for review

Thanks Joel, that all sounds perfect. Please proceed as described from 10:30am tomorrow morning 🙂

Cheers,

Hi Joshua,

Thanks for confirming. Just to clarify, we’ll initiate maintenance mode on both the live site and the staging site at around 10:30am tomorrow.

At that time, we’ll begin the cutover process, during which the staging site breakthrucollegenewstg.kinsta.cloud will take over the primary domain breakthrucollege.edu.au . The full transition should take approximately 30 to 60 minutes.

Once the migration is complete, we’ll keep the maintenance page active so you can log into the back-end and verify everything before the site goes live. Based on your timeline, it’s reasonable to expect the entire process—cutover plus your checks—can be completed by 12:00–12:30pm.

Let me know if you’d like us to proceed as planned or if there are any other considerations you'd like us to factor in.

Hey Joel,

This is great, thank you. We're good to go with changes on the staging website. Can you please schedule cutover to occur from 10:30am tomorrow.

If you can also give me an ETA as to how long this will take approximately (I assume 30mins - 1hr for you to pull it across) - I'd like the opportunity to quickly go in the back-end while the maintenance page is still up to check everything is OK before we open the site back up again.

Hoping to be finished by 12 - 12:30pm once you're done and I've finished checking, but let me know what's reasonable.

Regards,

Joshua Cook

Marketing Manager, Disability Services

T 1800 767 212


|

Hi Joshua,

We have updated the image on maintenance, let me know if you want to add the maintenance to the current live site.

Regarding the https://breakthrucollegenewstg.kinsta.cloud/: We have disabled the wp-rocket for now as it is causing the layout issue.
https://breakthrucollegenewstg.kinsta.cloud/chc33021-certificate-iii-in-individual-support-new/

Thanks Joel, any chance we can swap the image on the maintenance page from the existing stock to one of our own - such as this?
https://breakthrucollegenewstg.kinsta.cloud/wp-content/uploads/2024/12/Leigh-Certificate-III-Individual-Support-3-gen.webp

Also, all of the styling appears to be ruined on one of the major pages we were reworking (see below). Fortunately we don't need to make any other updates now - but can I get you to fix this for me if it's quick, or just confirm the styling will be fixed when it goes live?


Thanks,

Joshua Cook

Hi Joshua,

Sorry for the confusion.

This is how the maintenance would look like on the live site: https://stg-breakthrucollege-staging.kinsta.cloud/ (This link is a copy of the current live site. Please see the attached)

Once we have the green light:
https://breakthrucollegenewstg.kinsta.cloud/ will become breakthrucollege.edu.au

Hey Joel,

This one isn't looking quite right sorry mate. The main changes we're wanting to port across are significant work we've done using the Axcelerate plugin, which you can see installed in the back-end. We've also updated the enrolment form buttons/functionality on our main qualification pages (Certificate III in Individual Support, etc. - you'll notice on stg-breakthrucollege, hovering "enrol" creates a drop down, but our preferred behaviour is a pop up).

We've also done significant work on a new page https://breakthrucollegenewstg.kinsta.cloud/chc33021-certificate-iii-in-individual-support-new/ (which I now notice has very broken styling) - this needs to come across, as it will replace the current page at https://breakthrucollegenewstg.kinsta.cloud/qualifications/certificate-iii-individual-support/.

None of these changes appear to be reflected on https://stg-breakthrucollege-staging.kinsta.cloud/. To keep it simple, can you revert any updates you made on https://breakthrucollegenewstg.kinsta.cloud/ to fix the styling changes, and can we then just port this across straight to https://www.breakthrucollege.edu.au/ and ignore https://stg-breakthrucollege-staging.kinsta.cloud/?

Hope this makes sense - let me know.

Regards,

Joshua Cook

Marketing Manager, Disability Services

let us know if this works for you and if you want to add this now on live site?

Great, thanks Joel. Just maintenance on the live site is fine as that's the only consumer-facing version.

I'll confirm with you tomorrow afternoon, but for now can you tentatively book us in to do a cut over from https://breakthrucollegenewstg.kinsta.cloud/ -> https://www.breakthrucollege.edu.au/ around 10:30am this Friday 02/05/25 please. During this period can you place https://www.breakthrucollege.edu.au/ into maintenance mode.

While I think of it, can you actually show me what our maintenance page looks like?

Regards,

Joshua Cook​​​​

Hi Joshua,

I hope you're doing well.

Yes, we can schedule the maintenance window for either Thursday afternoon or Friday, depending on your preference.

Would you like us to prepare the maintenance mode on just the current live site, or on both the live and staging environments?

Please let us know your preference and give us the go-ahead adding the maintenance.
